articles.title: Darren Stevens: Kent all-rounder considering next move after One-Day Cup final victory - BBC
articles.description: Veteran Kent all-rounder Darren Stevens, 46, is weighing up his next move after helping the county to their second trophy in as many years.
articles.content:
Darren Stevens was one of only three Kent players in both the One-Day Cup side and last year's T20 Blast triumph
